description:
The Penguin Publishing Group is one of the leading trade book publishers in the United States, comprised of imprints with a long and rich history dating back to the nineteenth century. Penguin Books was originally founded in the UK in 1935 by Allen Lane, who envisioned a collection of quality, attractive books affordable enough to be “bought as easily and casually as a packet of cigarettes.” A United States office opened in 1939, called Penguin Books Ltd. The group merged with Putnam Berkley to become Penguin Putnam, Inc. in 1996, Penguin Group (USA) in 2003, and Penguin Publishing Group in 2014.

Today, Penguin Publishing Group is the largest division of Penguin Random House, Inc.
name: Penguin Publishing Group

COURAGE IS CALLING … will you answer? 📞

Overcome your fears with Ryan Holiday’s bestselling guide to practicing courage in your daily life. Holiday examines elements and expressions of fear, courage, and heroism and explores courageous acts of lesser-known figures from ancient and modern history.

Read COURAGE IS CALLING to step into the arena and face your fears.

📸: @nonfictionchocolate on Instagram

Privileged influencers attributing their cushy lives to “good vibes” isn’t the most…inspirational (or believable) content. But if you’ve completely written the practice off as a result, you might be missing out according to physician, neuroscientist, and author of "Mind Magic" James R. Doty, M.D. There’s actually plenty of science behind manifestation, and it’s a legitimate self-development technique that, when done correctly, can be life-altering. Learn why manifesting can actually work—and how to go about it the right way via SELF Magazine.
 
https://buff.ly/3BNMjju

Make the most of your money and get RICH AF with TikTok star Vivian Tu’s New York Times bestselling financial playbook. Learn to: 

✅ Identify tax strategies and legal loopholes
💸 Maximize your earnings
🏦 Understand the different types of bank accounts
📈 Overcome fears about investing

And more! Grab a copy today to level up your financial freedom.

Don't miss Sara Imari Walker on Sam Walker's podcast, Making Sense! 🧬🎙️ The two discuss physics' contributions to our scientific understanding of life, Erwin Schrödinger, the Fermi paradox, and much, much more.

You can listen here: https://lnkd.in/gsyegH92

Are you tired of being a chronic people-pleaser?

Experts, including Nedra Tawwab and Jefferson Fisher, share practical advice and tips for working through the fears that drive people-pleasing habits, along with strategies for having healthy conversations and setting boundaries with others-- and yourself.

Read more on The New York Times.

Listen now: Vince Beiser, author of the upcoming book POWER METAL, was featured on Marketplace! 🎙️ 

In his interview, Vince talks about the crucial role of metals like copper, lithium, and cobalt in renewable energy, the environmental and social impacts of mining, and China's influence over the supply chain. 

Check out the full episode here: https://lnkd.in/gp6S_V-5

And find POWER METAL on shelves November 19! https://lnkd.in/exj5AHBk
